metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7699 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer over-read occurs in AP4_BitStream::WriteBytes in Codecs/Ap4BitStream.cpp in Bento4 v1.5.1-627. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause an exception via crafted mp4 input, which leads to a denial of service.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
